content_profile.title: ChatGPT Operator Built a $500/Day Business in 30 Minutes (tutorial)

key_takeaways: Solution: Proper prompting techniques and iterative approach (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Real-time demonstration videos showing AI tools in action (Channel: content)
AI Workflow: Automated Marketplace Arbitrage Research
Strategy: Retail arbitrage using AI automation - find undervalued items on one marketplace and sell on another
Strategy: Dropshipping arbitrage model - list items at higher prices on one platform, buy from cheaper platfor

startup_ideas.title: AI-powered marketplace arbitrage platform
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Time-intensive manual research for price discrepancies across marketplaces
startup_ideas.business_model: SaaS subscription for automated arbitrage detection and execution
startup_ideas.validation: High engagement on arbitrage content, existing manual market
startup_ideas.estimated_investment: AI development costs, marketplace API integrations
